text: A chiliagon or 1000-gon is a shape with 1000 sides and 1000 corners. == Regular chiliagon == A regular chiliagon is represented by Schl√§fli symbol {1000} and can be constructed as a truncated 500-gon, t{500}, or a twice- truncated 250-gon, tt{250}, or a thrice-truncated 125-gon, ttt{125}. === Area === The amount of space a regular chiliagon takes up is :A = 250a^2 \cot \frac{\pi}{1000} \simeq 79577.2\,a^2 a is the length of one of its sides. ==Related pages== * Circle * Hectogon * Myriagon 1000
title: Chiliagon
